title: What is the best country if you want to be a digital nomad? - Quora

response.answer_text: You have to look for countries that has favourable tax schemes for selling outside those countries. Coming from Italy a popular and close country could be Malta. This is (one of) the reason(s) Jeff Bezos has seated Amazon in Oregon originally. As online book sales outside Oregon weren’t subject to General Sales Tax. Good luck in your endeavour, but consider paying back to the community as much you can if not tax than in kind. Peace,
